rows.label: tev022601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev022601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Liviana about ground gear.

rows.label: tev022601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev022601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Liviana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Liviana about her experiences with the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev022601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Liviana about conditions during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev022601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Liviana for her thoughts on Elma.

rows.label: tev022601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Liviana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Liviana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0001
rows.name:
My shop sells a wide variety of men's and women's
attire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0002
rows.name:
However, it's merely conventional clothing.
We don't carry the protective armor or "ground gear"
worn by BLADE operatives like yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0003
rows.name:
If that's what you're in the market for, you should
go to Armory Alley in the administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0004
rows.name:
I went there once myself out of curiosity—they were
selling items from a wide variety of manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was impressed at how risqué a lot of the ground gear
for women was! Not that I could hope to pull it off...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0008
rows.name: Lately I have been thinking a lot about my family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0009
rows.name:
My daughter will turn 20 this year,
although she's currently asleep in the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ever since she was a little girl, she always took such
good care of the clothes and jewelry I bought her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0011
rows.name:
On her birthday, she'd always ask me to pick out
a present that I thought looked nice. Isn't that sweet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0012
rows.name: So I bought a lovely outfit here for her 20th birthday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0013
rows.name:
But if we don't find the Lifehold Core, I'll never be able
to give it to her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Oh, please go out and find the Core!
You must bring my daughter home to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0019
rows.name: I've had Ma-non coming into my shop recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0020
rows.name:
The women were quite disappointed that none of our
clothes fit them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0021
rows.name:
And the men didn't show interest in our clothes at all.
They said they were "so so weak and flimsy, with no
protective value." ...Although rather more meekly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0022
rows.name:
They may be xenoforms, but it's funny how they're
no different from humans in that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0027
rows.name:
I don't need to ask what it was like here during the
attack, because I played back the footage from the
store's outer security camera.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0028
rows.name:
I've never seen enemies like that before.
The way they walked through the streets was terrifying.
And whenever they saw a BLADE operative...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0029
rows.name:
I just can't imagine hell being any worse than the
streets of New LA during that attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0030
rows.name:
We're truly lucky to have survived.
And not just me and you, but this entire city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0035
rows.name:
I saw those two famous BLADE operatives, Elma and
Irina, shopping at a store near here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0036
rows.name:
I was shocked at how drastically Elma had changed
her image![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG0037
rows.name:
It made me wonder if maybe she has a secret?
Perhaps she used the Lifepod that strange man in the
administrative district's lowest level was talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1001
rows.name:
One of my saleswomen, Dorothy, has found herself a
boyfriend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1002
rows.name:
They seem to be very happy together,
and they're already talking about marriage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1003
rows.name:
Still, I can't help but think of my daughter, who is
sleeping in the Lifehold Core, when I see Dorothy so
happy. They're the same age, you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1004
rows.name:
But of course I'm happy for Dorothy! And if they do get
married, I'll make sure to give her the best wedding
dress in the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1005
rows.name: Hopefully this will be the start of a lovely family...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1011
rows.name:
Dorothy is so miserable that it hurts to even think about
her situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1012
rows.name:
She said she and her boyfriend wanted to get married,
so I put aside a wedding dress for her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1013
rows.name: But then her beau... He died in the line of duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022601_MSG1014
rows.name:
She reminds me so much of my daughter who's
asleep in the Lifehold Core. I just wanted her to
be happy.[ST:wait ]
